knimeNode.name: Facebook Account Connector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Selects a specific Facebook Account for use in Insight and API queries.

fullDescription.intro: Provides additional configuration to a Facebook API Connection by specifying an Account that will be used in down-stream processes (metric acquisition, etc). Drop-down select chooser can be used to facilitate ID and Token discovery.

ports.outPort: Connection to Facebook API with Selected Account
